DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether fix dose combination ( FDC ) capsule esomeprazole 20 mg acetylsalicylic acid ( ASA ) 81 mg equivalent therapeutic efficacy compare 2 free combination ASA tablet 81 mg plus esomeprazole 20 mg patient risk gastrointestinal event use low dose ASA cardiovascular protection .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Esomeprazole ASA Combined Together One Capsule Versus These Medications Taken Separately
